nodes.text: Aunt Z's Tavern was the most popular eatery on the Colossus. It was owned by Z'Vk'Thkrkza, whose alias Aunt Z gave the tavern its name. A droid named Glitch assisted her by serving clients and running simulation on the races' odds. The tavern was one of the sponsors of Hype Fazon, and his ship, Green Ace.

Newcomers or regulars, like Al and Jooks, could go there to eat, bet on the races, receive wise advice from Aunt Z, and of course enjoy a drink at the counter, which was often busy, in one of the alcoves, or on the balcony, which had a direct view of Doza Tower. Besides refreshment, foods, bets, and the occasional bar fight, patrons could also entertain themselves with music from a jukebox, two arcades, and a holo-dart target.

The place was decorated with all sort of oddities. Behind the counter was a collection of helmets, some of them Mandalorian, Imperial, rebel, or even from the old clone trooper pilot. There was also a reproduction of the decal that decorated the flanks of the Crumb Bomber, a gunship from the Clone Wars.
